alert.note: Alert for Gage; Jefferson; Lancaster; Saline (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 6:14AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Lancaster, Jefferson, southern Saline and Gage Counties through 645 AM CDT... At 613 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Wilber to 2 miles southwest of Plymouth to 2 miles south of Alexandria. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree branches and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Plymouth, Jansen and Harbine around 620 AM CDT. Fairbury and Diller around 630 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Pickrell, Beatrice, Endicott, Wymore, Blue Springs, Odell, Steele City and Holmesville. People attending Jefferson County Fairgrounds should seek safe shelter immediately! MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
